statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_count > 10;
DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number = 100 AND transaction_id = 'd33f6eea-5d7e-4468-a93b-874465d5830b';
DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number = 1000 AND sender_address = '0x123456789abcdef';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE receiver_address = 'address1' AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM Blocks WHERE block_number = 1000 AND miner_address = '0xABCDEF'
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456' AND receiver_address = '0x789012'
